data.lyric:
[ti:Hell Right]
[ar:Blake Shelton/Trace Adkins]
[al:Hell Right (feat. Trace Adkins)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Hell Right - Blake Shelton/Trace Adkins
[00:03.42]Lyrics by：David Garcia/Brett Tyler/Michael Hardy
[00:06.84]Hey
[00:08.58]Yeah
[00:10.81]Tell 'em that story you were tellin' me
[00:15.63]Couple boys clock out about 5:35
[00:18.87]Tryna put a little hammer in their head
[00:22.14]Standing in the liquor store staring at a fifth
[00:25.04]But they picked up a handle instead
[00:28.27]Hell right
[00:29.88]Hell right
[00:31.38]Hell right
[00:33.19]Okay
[00:34.70]Couple girls with their boots on got their bluetooth on
[00:38.09]T-shirts saying go sooners
[00:40.92]Then the girl from the small town took off the Old Town
[00:44.39]Put on a little Hank Jr.
[00:46.40]Thank God
[00:47.28]Hell right
[00:50.13]She got all her rowdy friends comin' over tonight
[00:53.59]Hell right hell right
[00:56.68]Everybody's throwin' down on a Friday night
[00:59.83]Somewhere in America
[01:02.92]There's a bottle to burn and a fire to light
[01:05.84]And you ain't done nothin' if you did it half way
[01:09.29]If you gonna raise hell then you better d**n raise
[01:12.42]Hell right
[01:14.06]Hell right
[01:15.63]Hell right
[01:21.53]There's a guitar on the ground that was making some sound
[01:25.02]'Til somebody pulled a hillbilly slip
[01:28.34]Now there's fog on the window she never would've kissed him
[01:31.31]If he didn't play a lick like this
[01:34.60]Hell right
[01:37.86]Hell right
[01:40.90]Hell right hell right
[01:44.17]Everybody's throwin' down on a Friday night
[01:47.17]Somewhere in America
[01:50.31]There's a bottle to burn and a fire to light
[01:53.23]And you ain't done nothin' if you did it half way
[01:56.58]If you gonna raise hell then you better d**n raise
[01:59.78]Hell right
[02:01.41]Hell right
[02:02.96]Hell right
[02:15.68]Now it's 7am
[02:17.42]D**n if there ain't an empty handle on a square hay bell
[02:21.52]Everybody's passed out drunk but when they wake up
[02:25.05]They're all gonna hurt like hell right
[02:29.98]Yeah boy
[02:31.37]Hell right hell right
[02:34.58]Everybody's throwin' down on a Friday night
[02:37.67]Somewhere in America
[02:40.83]There's a bottle to burn and a fire to light
[02:43.74]And you ain't done nothin' if you did it half way
[02:47.21]If you gonna raise hell then you better d**n raise
[02:50.28]Hell right
[02:51.89]Hell right
[02:53.49]Hell right
data.trans:
[ti:Hell Right]
[ar:Blake Shelton/Trace Adkins]
[al:Hell Right (feat. Trace Adkins)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.42]//
[00:06.84]//
[00:08.58]//
[00:10.81]把你跟我讲的故事告诉他们
[00:15.63]有几个小子在五点半的时候打卡下班
[00:18.87]想要好好教训一下他们
[00:22.14]站在卖酒的店里 我盯着750毫升的酒
[00:25.04]但他们给我拿了1.75升的
[00:28.27]没有错
[00:29.88]没有错
[00:31.38]没有错
[00:33.19]好吧
[00:34.70]有几个姑娘穿着靴子 打开手机蓝牙
[00:38.09]T恤上写着 早点行动
[00:40.92]然后来自小城的姑娘在这老城里发展起来了
[00:44.39]学一学Hank Jr.的模样
[00:46.40]感谢上苍
[00:47.28]没有错
[00:50.13]今晚她把所有捣蛋朋友都叫来了
[00:53.59]没有错 没错
[00:56.68]每个人都在周五晚上肆无忌惮地狂欢
[00:59.83]美国的某个地方
[01:02.92]有好喝的酒 有好玩的事
[01:05.84]如果你半途而废 那你相当于一事无成
[01:09.29]如果你打算大闹一场 那你最好赶紧的
[01:12.42]没有错
[01:14.06]没有错
[01:15.63]没有错
[01:21.53]现场有一把吉他 弹奏着美妙的音乐
[01:25.02]直到某个人出了差错 闹出了笑话
[01:28.34]现在窗户上雾蒙蒙的 她本来不可能亲他的
[01:31.31]都是因为他演奏了这么美妙的音乐
[01:34.60]没有错
[01:37.86]没有错
[01:40.90]没有错 没错

[01:56.58]如果你打算大闹一场 那你最好赶紧的

[02:01.41]没有错
[02:02.96]没有错
[02:15.68]现在是早上七点
[02:17.42]地上摆着一个空空荡荡的酒瓶子
[02:21.52]每个人都醉得昏睡了过去 但当他们醒来之后
[02:25.05]他们将会痛苦不堪
[02:29.98]没错
[02:31.37]没有错 没错
